remarks: Lemma for ~ stoweid : two class variables replace two setvar variables, for multiplication of two functions.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
statement:
stoweidlem6.1 $e |- F/ t f = F $.
stoweidlem6.2 $e |- F/ t g = G $.
stoweidlem6.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ f e. A /\ g e. A ) -> ( t e. T |-> ( ( f ` t ) x. ( g ` t ) ) ) e. A ) $.
stoweidlem6 $p |- ( ( ph /\ F e. A /\ G e. A ) -> ( t e. T |-> ( ( F ` t ) x. ( G ` t ) ) ) e. A ) $.
$d A f g $.
$d F f g $.
$d G g $.
$d T f g $.
$d f g ph $.
$d f g t $.
